snippet: The Warriors’ star scored more points in a single overtime period than any other player in N.B.A. history after missing four games with a knee injury.
abstract: Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry's record-setting scoring performance in overtime period against Portland Trail Blazers in Game 4 of Western Conference semifinal series is analyzed.
lead_paragraph: The Warriors’ star scored more points in a single overtime period than any other player in N.B.A. history after missing four games with a knee injury.

headline.main: Stephen Curry’s 17-Point Overtime: Shot by Shot
headline.print_headline: Breaking Down Curry’s 17-Point Overtime, Shot by Shot
